title: GROUP MEETING GUYS!
body:
{{champion:122}} Alright guys, so its quite apparent that we arent all getting picked as much.. 

{{champion:254}} Yeah.. We use to be in like, Atleast Every 5 games.. but now seeing us is like a dream..

{{champion:59}} Well, WE HAVE been put through nerfs, over looks, and even took as under powered, compared to our current rivals...

{{champion:24}} Yeah.. Even Fish Sticks has been getting more veiwage that I have...

{{champion:18}} And ever since Miss Psycho has came around, I've been neglected! I mean, i've even settled for learning a new trick, but.. They still wont accept me!

{{champion:121}} Calm down Tristanna... Chaaaaaaange is gooooooood.... 

{{champion:59}} You know.. Now that you think about it.. Where is our Support? i mean, i get the fact that she is slow, but.. Hell, You'd think she'd be here by now...

{{champion:24}} Yeah.. Where is Leona, Anyways? 

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/5.2.2/img/spell/LeonaSolarFlare.png

{{champion:18}} GAH! Leona! What did we tell you about doing that!?

{{champion:89}} Sorry Scrubs, But i'm leaving the group.. 

{{champion:122}} {{champion:254}}  WHAT!?

{{champion:89}} Well, You see, Unlike you guys, I'm still a common pick, in all ranks.. So, How should i say this... Its better to be with the living deer than the rotting carcass... So yeah... See ya~ 

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/5.2.2/img/spell/LeonaSolarBarrier.png

{{champion:18}} Leona... Out of the squad... Who shall be our support now....
